alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 17 at 6:28PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northwestern Jones County in west central Texas... Northeastern Fisher County in west central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hitson, or 10 miles northwest of Hamlin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Hamlin around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Hitson and Tuxedo. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
